named-query.name: TasksAssignedAsBusinessAdministrator
named-query.query: select distinct new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t join t.peopleAssignments.businessAdministrators businessAdministrators where t.archived = 0 and businessAdministrators.id = :userId order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: TasksAssignedAsBusinessAdministratorByStatus
named-query.query:
select distinct new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t join t.peopleAssignments.businessAdministrators businessAdministrators where t.archived = 0 and ( businessAdministrators.id = :userId or businessAdministrators.id in (:groupIds) ) and t.taskData.status in (:status)
order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: TasksAssignedAsExcludedOwner
named-query.query: select distinct new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t join t.peopleAssignments.excludedOwners excludedOwners where t.archived = 0 and excludedOwners.id = :userId order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: TasksAssignedAsPotentialOwner
named-query.query: select distinct new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t join t.peopleAssignments.potentialOwners potentialOwners where t.archived = 0 and potentialOwners.id = :userId and (:userId not member of t.peopleAssignments.excludedOwners) and (t.taskData.actualOwner.id = :userId or t.taskData.actualOwner is null) and t.taskData.status in ('Created', 'Ready', 'Reserved', 'InProgress', 'Suspended') order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: TasksAssignedAsPotentialOwnerByStatus
named-query.query: select distinct new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t join t.peopleAssignments.potentialOwners potentialOwners where t.archived = 0 and potentialOwners.id = :userId and (:userId not member of t.peopleAssignments.excludedOwners) and (t.taskData.actualOwner.id = :userId or t.taskData.actualOwner is null) and t.taskData.status in (:status) order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: TasksAssignedAsPotentialOwnerByStatusByGroup
named-query.query: select distinct new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t join t.peopleAssignments.potentialOwners potentialOwners where t.archived = 0 and (t.taskData.actualOwner.id = :userId or t.taskData.actualOwner is null) and t.taskData.status in (:status) and ( potentialOwners.id = :userId or potentialOwners.id in (:groupIds) ) and (:userId not member of t.peopleAssignments.excludedOwners) order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: TasksAssignedAsPotentialOwnerWithGroups
named-query.query: select distinct new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t join t.peopleAssignments.potentialOwners potentialOwners where t.archived = 0 and (t.taskData.actualOwner.id = :userId or t.taskData.actualOwner is null) and t.taskData.status in ('Created', 'Ready', 'Reserved', 'InProgress', 'Suspended') and ( potentialOwners.id = :userId or potentialOwners.id in (:groupIds) ) and (:userId not member of t.peopleAssignments.excludedOwners) order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: TasksAssignedAsPotentialOwnerByStatusWithGroups
named-query.query: select distinct new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t join t.peopleAssignments.potentialOwners potentialOwners where t.archived = 0 and (t.taskData.actualOwner.id = :userId or t.taskData.actualOwner is null) and t.taskData.status in (:status) and ( potentialOwners.id = :userId or potentialOwners.id in (:groupIds) ) and (:userId not member of t.peopleAssignments.excludedOwners) order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: TasksAssignedAsPotentialOwnerByGroup
named-query.query: select distinct new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t join t.peopleAssignments.potentialOwners potentialOwners where t.archived = 0 and t.taskData.actualOwner = null and t.taskData.status in ('Created', 'Ready', 'Reserved', 'InProgress', 'Suspended') and potentialOwners.id = :groupId order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: TasksAssignedAsPotentialOwnerByGroups
named-query.query:
select
t.id, potentialOwners.id
from TaskImpl t join t.peopleAssignments.potentialOwners potentialOwners
where
t.archived = 0 and t.taskData.actualOwner = null and t.taskData.status in ('Created', 'Ready', 'Reserved', 'InProgress', 'Suspended') and potentialOwners.id in (:groupIds)

named-query.name: TasksAssignedAsPotentialOwnerStatusByExpirationDate
named-query.query: select distinct new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t join t.peopleAssignments.potentialOwners potentialOwners where t.archived = 0 and (t.taskData.actualOwner.id = :userId or t.taskData.actualOwner is null) and t.taskData.expirationTime = :expirationDate and t.taskData.status in (:status) and ( potentialOwners.id = :userId or potentialOwners.id in (:groupIds) ) and (:userId not member of t.peopleAssignments.excludedOwners) order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: TasksAssignedAsPotentialOwnerStatusByExpirationDateOptional
named-query.query: select distinct new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t join t.peopleAssignments.potentialOwners potentialOwners where t.archived = 0 and (t.taskData.actualOwner.id = :userId or t.taskData.actualOwner is null) and (t.taskData.expirationTime = :expirationDate or t.taskData.expirationTime is null) and t.taskData.status in (:status) and ( potentialOwners.id = :userId or potentialOwners.id in (:groupIds) ) and (:userId not member of t.peopleAssignments.excludedOwners) order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: TasksAssignedAsPotentialOwnerByGroupsByExpirationDate
named-query.query:
select
t.id, potentialOwners.id
from TaskImpl t join t.peopleAssignments.potentialOwners potentialOwners
where
t.archived = 0 and t.taskData.actualOwner = null and t.taskData.expirationTime = :expirationDate and t.taskData.status in ('Created', 'Ready', 'Reserved', 'InProgress', 'Suspended') and potentialOwners.id in (:groupIds)

named-query.name: GetPotentialOwnersForTaskIds
named-query.query:
select t.id, potentialOwners from TaskImpl t, OrganizationalEntityImpl potentialOwners
where t.id in (:taskIds) and potentialOwners in elements ( t.peopleAssignments.potentialOwners )

named-query.name: TasksAssignedAsPotentialOwnerByGroupsByExpirationDateOptional
named-query.query:
select
t.id, potentialOwners.id
from TaskImpl t join t.peopleAssignments.potentialOwners potentialOwners
where
t.archived = 0 and t.taskData.actualOwner = null and (t.taskData.expirationTime = :expirationDate or t.taskData.expirationTime is null) and t.taskData.status in ('Created', 'Ready', 'Reserved', 'InProgress', 'Suspended') and potentialOwners.id in (:groupIds)

named-query.name: SubTasksAssignedAsPotentialOwner
named-query.query: select distinct new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t join t.peopleAssignments.potentialOwners potentialOwners where t.archived = 0 and t.taskData.parentId = :parentId and (t.taskData.actualOwner.id = :userId or t.taskData.actualOwner is null) and t.taskData.status in ('Created', 'Ready', 'Reserved', 'InProgress', 'Suspended') and (potentialOwners.id = :userId or potentialOwners.id in (:groupIds)) and (:userId not member of t.peopleAssignments.excludedOwners) order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: GetSubTasksByParentTaskId
named-query.query: select distinct new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t, OrganizationalEntityImpl potentialOwners where t.archived = 0 and t.taskData.parentId = :parentId and t.taskData.status in ('Created', 'Ready', 'Reserved', 'InProgress', 'Suspended') order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: TasksAssignedAsRecipient
named-query.query: select distinct new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t join t.peopleAssignments.recipients recipients where t.archived = 0 and recipients.id = :userId order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: TasksAssignedAsTaskInitiator
named-query.query: select distinct new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t join t.peopleAssignments.taskInitiator taskInitiators where t.archived = 0 and taskInitiators.id = :userId order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: TasksAssignedAsTaskStakeholder
named-query.query:
select distinct new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t join t.peopleAssignments.taskStakeholders taskStakeholders where t.archived = 0 and taskStakeholders.id = :userId
order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: TasksOwned
named-query.query:
select distinct new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t
where t.archived = 0 and t.taskData.actualOwner.id = :userId
order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: TasksOwnedWithParticularStatusByExpirationDate
named-query.query:
select new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t left join t.peopleAssignments.potentialOwners potOwners where t.archived = 0 and (t.taskData.actualOwner.id = :userId or potOwners.id = :userId) and t.taskData.status in (:status) and t.taskData.expirationTime = :expirationDate
order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: TasksOwnedWithParticularStatusByExpirationDateBeforeSpecifiedDate
named-query.query:
select new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t
left join t.peopleAssignments.potentialOwners potOwners where t.archived = 0 and (t.taskData.actualOwner.id = :userId or potOwners.id = :userId) and t.taskData.status in (:status) and t.taskData.expirationTime < :date
order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: TasksOwnedWithParticularStatusByExpirationDateOptional
named-query.query:
select new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t left join t.peopleAssignments.potentialOwners potOwners where t.archived = 0 and (t.taskData.actualOwner.id = :userId or potOwners.id = :userId) and t.taskData.status in (:status) and (t.taskData.expirationTime = :expirationDate or t.taskData.expirationTime is null)
order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: TasksByStatus
named-query.query:
select distinct new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t
where t.archived = 0 and t.taskData.status = :status order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: TasksByStatusSince
named-query.query:
select new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t
where t.archived = 0 and t.taskData.status = :status and
t.taskData.activationTime > :since
order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: ArchivedTasks
named-query.query: select distinct new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t where t.archived = 1

named-query.name: TasksOwnedWithParticularStatus
named-query.query:
select distinct new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t
where t.archived = 0 and t.taskData.actualOwner.id = :userId and t.taskData.status in (:status)
order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: TaskSummariesByIds
named-query.query:
select new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t
where t.id in (:taskIds) order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: TasksOwnedPotentialOwnersByTaskIds
named-query.query:
select
t.id, potentialOwners.id
from TaskImpl t, OrganizationalEntityImpl potentialOwners
where
t.id in (:taskIds) and potentialOwners in elements ( t.peopleAssignments.potentialOwners ) and t.archived = 0 and t.taskData.status in ('Created', 'Ready', 'Reserved', 'InProgress', 'Suspended')

named-query.name: UnescalatedEndDeadlines
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.services.task.query.DeadlineSummaryImpl( t.id, d.id, d.date) from TaskImpl t, DeadlineImpl d where t.archived = 0 and d in elements( t.deadlines.endDeadlines ) and d.escalated = 0 order by d.date

named-query.name: UnescalatedStartDeadlines
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.services.task.query.DeadlineSummaryImpl( t.id, d.id, d.date) from TaskImpl t, DeadlineImpl d where t.archived = 0 and d in elements( t.deadlines.startDeadlines ) and d.escalated = 0 order by d.date

named-query.name: UnescalatedEndDeadlinesByTaskId
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.services.task.query.DeadlineSummaryImpl( t.id, d.id, d.date) from TaskImpl t, DeadlineImpl d where t.id = :taskId and t.archived = 0 and d in elements( t.deadlines.endDeadlines ) and d.escalated = 0 order by d.date

named-query.name: UnescalatedStartDeadlinesByTaskId
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.services.task.query.DeadlineSummaryImpl( t.id, d.id, d.date) from TaskImpl t, DeadlineImpl d where t.id = :taskId and t.archived = 0 and d in elements( t.deadlines.startDeadlines ) and d.escalated = 0 order by d.date

named-query.name: UnescalatedEndDeadlinesByTaskIdForReminder
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.services.task.query.DeadlineSummaryImpl( t.id, d.id, d.date) from TaskImpl t, DeadlineImpl d where t.id = :taskId and t.archived = 0 and d in elements( t.deadlines.endDeadlines ) order by d.date

named-query.name: UnescalatedStartDeadlinesByTaskIdForReminder
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.services.task.query.DeadlineSummaryImpl( t.id, d.id, d.date) from TaskImpl t, DeadlineImpl d where t.id = :taskId and t.archived = 0 and d in elements( t.deadlines.startDeadlines ) order by d.date

named-query.name: TaskByWorkItemId
named-query.query: select t from TaskImpl t where t.archived = 0 and t.taskData.workItemId = :workItemId

named-query.name: TasksByStatusByProcessId
named-query.query:
select distinct new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t
where t.archived = 0 and t.taskData.processInstanceId = :processInstanceId and
t.taskData.status in (:status)

named-query.name: TasksByStatusByProcessIdByTaskName
named-query.query:
select distinct new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t
where t.archived = 0 and t.taskData.processInstanceId = :processInstanceId and t.name = :taskName and t.taskData.status in (:status) order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: TasksByProcessInstanceId
named-query.query: select t.id from TaskImpl t where t.archived = 0 and t.taskData.processInstanceId = :processInstanceId

named-query.name: AttachmentsByTaskId
named-query.query: select a from TaskImpl t join t.taskData.attachments as a where t.id = :taskId order by a.id ASC

named-query.name: QuickTasksAssignedAsPotentialOwnerWithGroupsByStatus
named-query.query: select distinct new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t join t.peopleAssignments.potentialOwners potentialOwners where t.archived = 0 and (t.taskData.actualOwner.id = :userId or t.taskData.actualOwner is null) and t.taskData.status in (:status) and ( potentialOwners.id = :userId or potentialOwners.id in (:groupIds) ) and (:userId not member of t.peopleAssignments.excludedOwners) order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: QuickTasksAssignedAsPotentialOwnerStatusByExpirationDateOptional
named-query.query: select distinct new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t join t.peopleAssignments.potentialOwners potentialOwners where t.archived = 0 and (t.taskData.actualOwner.id = :userId or t.taskData.actualOwner is null) and (t.taskData.expirationTime = :expirationDate or t.taskData.expirationTime is null) and t.taskData.status in (:status) and ( potentialOwners.id = :userId or potentialOwners.id in (:groupIds) ) and (:userId not member of t.peopleAssignments.excludedOwners) order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: QuickTasksAssignedAsPotentialOwnerStatusByExpirationDate
named-query.query: select distinct new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t join t.peopleAssignments.potentialOwners potentialOwners where t.archived = 0 and (t.taskData.actualOwner.id = :userId or t.taskData.actualOwner is null) and t.taskData.expirationTime = :expirationDate and t.taskData.status in (:status) and ( potentialOwners.id = :userId or potentialOwners.id in (:groupIds) ) and (:userId not member of t.peopleAssignments.excludedOwners) order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: NewTasksAssignedAsPotentialOwner
named-query.query: select distinct new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t join t.peopleAssignments.potentialOwners potentialOwners where t.archived = 0 and (t.taskData.actualOwner.id = :userId or t.taskData.actualOwner is null) and t.taskData.status in (:status) and (potentialOwners.id = :userId or potentialOwners.id in (:groupIds)) and (:userId not member of t.peopleAssignments.excludedOwners) order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: NewTasksAssignedAsPotentialOwnerByExpirationDateOptional
named-query.query: select distinct new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t join t.peopleAssignments.potentialOwners potentialOwners where t.archived = 0 and (t.taskData.actualOwner.id = :userId or t.taskData.actualOwner is null) and (t.taskData.expirationTime = :expirationDate or t.taskData.expirationTime is null) and t.taskData.status in (:status) and ( potentialOwners.id = :userId or potentialOwners.id in (:groupIds) ) and (:userId not member of t.peopleAssignments.excludedOwners) order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: NewTasksAssignedAsPotentialOwnerByExpirationDate
named-query.query: select distinct new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t join t.peopleAssignments.potentialOwners potentialOwners where t.archived = 0 and (t.taskData.actualOwner.id = :userId or t.taskData.actualOwner is null) and t.taskData.expirationTime = :expirationDate and t.taskData.status in (:status) and ( potentialOwners.id = :userId or potentialOwners.id in (:groupIds) ) and (:userId not member of t.peopleAssignments.excludedOwners) order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: NewTasksOwned
named-query.query: select distinct new org.jbpm.services.task.query.TaskSummaryImpl( t.id, t.name, t.subject, t.description, t.taskData.status, t.priority, t.taskData.actualOwner.id, t.taskData.createdBy.id, t.taskData.createdOn, t.taskData.activationTime, t.taskData.expirationTime, t.taskData.processId, t.taskData.processInstanceId, t.taskData.parentId, t.taskData.deploymentId, t.taskData.skipable ) from TaskImpl t where t.archived = 0 and t.taskData.actualOwner.id = :userId and t.taskData.status in (:status) order by t.id DESC

named-query.name: GetAllTasks
named-query.query: select t from TaskImpl t
